name: Dinosaur Destruction Death Dash
description:
DESCRIPTION:

65 million years ago... the end is nigh. A massive asteroid has hit the Earth and caused global catastrophe. Can you save your dinosaur pack from extinction before time is too late? Or is the death of your species, just the beginning for other life on this planet...? DEATH IS JUST THE BEGINNING!

CONTROLS (Keyboard & Mouse \ Partial Controller Support):

Move - WASD \ Left Thumbstick

Camera - Move Mouse \ Right Thumbstick

Jump - Space \ A Button

Pause - ESC \ Start Button
